glossentry.glossdef: Apache Ant is a Java library and command-line tool whose mission is to drive processes described in build files as targets and extension points dependent upon each other
Java programs implementing the doclet API to specify content and format for the Javadoc process.
A Java tool for generating API documentation in HTML format using doc comments in the source code.
A program implementing the Taglet API. A taglet can modify and format the text argument of a custom tag.

Apache Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a project object model (POM), Maven can manage a project's build, reporting and documentation from a central piece of information.
eXtensible Markup Language. A markup language to define a set of rules that is both machine and human readable.
XML Schema Document. A schema language to express a set of rulesto which an XML must conform too to be considered valid.
